de.gulden.application.jjack

Class JJackInfoBoxMouseListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
      • de.gulden.application.jjack.JJackInfoBoxMouseListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener

    class JJackInfoBoxMouseListener
extends java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    MouseListener class to handle info-box menu and displaying when right-clicking on a client's panel.
    Version:
    0.3
    Author:
    Jens Gulden
